name: TI_2_1_3_14_System_Maintenance___EHR_or_Clinical_Software_System_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.3.14 System Maintenance - EHR or Clinical Software System Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track system maintenance - EHR or clinical software.
purpose: Capture system maintenance - EHR or clinical software, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of a system maintenance event when EHR or clinical software is updated or re-configured.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.3.14#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).
